info.title: BillingManagementClient
info.description: Billing client provides access to billing resources and logs for Azure subscriptions.

get.description: Lists the subscriptions for a customer. The operation is supported only for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Partner Agreement.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the subscriptions for a billing account. The operation is supported for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement, Microsoft Partner Agreement or Enterprise Agreement.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a subscription by its ID. The operation is supported for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement and Microsoft Partner Agreement.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates the properties of a billing subscription. Currently, cost center can be updated. The operation is supported only for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Request parameters that are provided to the update billing subscription operation.

Location.description: Location URI to poll for result

Retry-After.description: Recommended time to wait before making another request to check the status of the operation. The time is specified in seconds.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

Location.description: Location URI to poll for result

Retry-After.description: Recommended time to wait before making another request to check the status of the operation. The time is specified in seconds.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Moves a subscription's charges to a new invoice section. The new invoice section must belong to the same billing profile as the existing invoice section. This operation is supported for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Request parameters that are provided to the move subscription operation.

202.description: Accepted. Billing Subscription transfer is in progress.

Location.description: Location URI to poll for result.

Retry-After.description: Recommended time to wait before making another request to check the status of the operation. The time is specified in seconds.

post.description: Validates if a subscription's charges can be moved to a new invoice section. This operation is supported for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Request parameters that are provided to the validate move eligibility operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Moves subscriptions to target enrollmentAccount. The target enrollmentAccount and source enrollmentAccount must be associated to the same Billing Account. This operation is supported only for subscriptions that are purchased with a recurring charge and for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Enterprise Agreement.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Request parameters that are provided to transfer account ownership.

202.description: Accepted. Account Ownership Transfer transfer is in progress.

Location.description: Location URI to poll for result.

Retry-After.description: Recommended time to wait before making another request to check the status of the operation. The time is specified in seconds.

post.description: Merges two existing subscriptions into a new subscription with quantity greater than the existing subscriptions individually.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Request parameters that are provided to merge the two billing subscriptions.

202.description: Accepted. Billing subscription merge is in progress.

Location.description: Location URI to poll for result.

Retry-After.description: Recommended time to wait before making another request to check the status of the operation. The time is specified in seconds.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Splits a subscription into a new subscription with quantity less than current subscription quantity and not equal to 0.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Request parameters that are provided to split the billing subscription.

202.description: Accepted. Billing subscription split is in progress.

Location.description: Location URI to poll for result.

Retry-After.description: Recommended time to wait before making another request to check the status of the operation. The time is specified in seconds.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the subscription aliases for a billing account. The operation is supported for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement, Microsoft Partner Agreement or Enterprise Agreement.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a subscription by its alias ID. The operation is supported for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement and Microsoft Partner Agreement.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates a billing subscription by its alias ID.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: New or updated billing subscription alias.

201.description: Created. Billing subscription creation is in progress.

Location.description: Location URI to poll for result

Retry-After.description: Recommended time to wait before making another request to check the status of the operation. The time is specified in seconds.

Location.description: Location URI to poll for result

Retry-After.description: Recommended time to wait before making another request to check the status of the operation. The time is specified in seconds.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists the available billing REST API operations.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

AccountOwnershipTransferRequest.description: Request parameters to transfer account ownership of billing subscription.

targetEnrollmentAccountName.description: The destination account to which the subscriptions are transferred.

transferSubscriptionTenant.description: This flag is false by default. By not setting this flag, it implies to move the new subscriptions to new account's Azure AD tenant.

billingSubscriptionId.description: This is optional parameter. The ID of the specific billing subscription that needs to be transferred. If this is not provided, all the subscriptions under the account shall be transferred to the destination account.

AccountOwnershipTransferResult.description: Result of the transfer subscription operation.

transferTrackingGuid.description: The tracking guid for transfer request.

billingSubscriptionId.description: The billing subscription ID provided in the transfer request. This is an optional field.

errorCode.description: The error code for the transfer request.

errorMessage.description: The error message for the status of transfer request.

initiationDate.description: The date of initiation of transfer request.

currency.description: The currency for the amount value.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

BillingSubscriptionProperties.description: The billing properties of a subscription.

extendedProperties.description: Dictionary of additional properties associated with the subscription.

autoRenew.description: Indicates whether auto renewal is turned on or off for a product.

billingProfileId.description: The ID of the billing profile to which the subscription is billed. This field is only applicable for Microsoft Customer Agreement billing accounts.

billingProfileDisplayName.description: The name of the billing profile to which the subscription is billed. This field is only applicable for Microsoft Customer Agreement billing accounts.

billingFrequency.description: The billing frequency in ISO8601 format of product in the subscription. Example: P1M, P3M, P1Y

billingProfileSpendingLimit.description: The spending limit that is set on the billing profile to which the subscription is billed.

consumptionCostCenter.description: The cost center applied to the subscription. This field is only available for consumption subscriptions of Microsoft Customer Agreement Type billing accounts.

customerId.description: The ID of the customer for whom the subscription was created. The field is applicable only for Microsoft Partner Agreement billing accounts.

customerDisplayName.description: The name of the customer for whom the subscription was created. The field is applicable only for Microsoft Partner Agreement billing accounts.

enrollmentAccountId.description: The enrollment Account ID associated with the subscription. This field is available only for the Enterprise Agreement Type billing accounts.

enrollmentAccountDisplayName.description: The enrollment Account name associated with the subscription. This field is available only for the Enterprise Agreement Type billing accounts.

enrollmentAccountSubscriptionDetails.title: Enrollment Account Subscription details. This field is available only for the Enterprise Agreement Type billing accounts.

invoiceSectionId.description: The ID of the invoice section to which the subscription is billed. The field is applicable only for Microsoft Partner Agreement billing accounts.

invoiceSectionDisplayName.description: The name of the invoice section to which the subscription is billed. The field is applicable only for Microsoft Partner Agreement billing accounts.

lastMonthCharges.description: The last month charges. This field is only available for consumption subscriptions of Microsoft Customer Agreement billing accounts.

monthToDateCharges.description: The current month to date charges. This field is only available for consumption subscriptions of Microsoft Customer Agreement billing accounts.

nextBillingCycleDetails.description: Next billing cycle details of the subscription.

offerId.description: The offer ID for the subscription. This field is only available for the Microsoft Online Services Program billing accounts.

productCategory.description: Category of the subscription. Possible values include: Consumption, SaaS, AzureSupport, AzureReservationOrder, AzureSavingsPlan, Hardware, M365

productType.description: Type of the product for which the subscription is purchased

productTypeId.description: Id of the product for which the subscription is purchased

publisherName.description: The organization that published the product for which the subscription is purchased.

purchaseDate.description: Purchase date of the product in UTC time.

quantity.description: The number of licenses purchased for the subscription

reseller.description: Reseller for this subscription. The fields is not available for Microsoft Partner Agreement billing accounts.

skuDescription.description: The SKU description of the product for which the subscription is purchased. This field is is only available  for Microsoft Customer Agreement billing accounts.

skuId.description: The SKU ID of the product for which the subscription is purchased. This field is is only available  for Microsoft Customer Agreement billing accounts.

status.description: The status of the subscription. This field is not available for Enterprise Agreement billing accounts.

consumptionSubscriptionId.description: The ID of the consumption subscription. This field is only available for consumption subscriptions of Microsoft Customer Agreement Type billing accounts.

suspensionReasons.description: The suspension reason for a subscription. This field is not available for Enterprise Agreement billing accounts.

tenantId.description: The id of the tenant in which the product is used.

termDuration.description: The duration for which you can use the subscription. Example P1Y and P1M

termStartDate.description: Start date of the term in UTC time.

termEndDate.description: End date of the term in UTC time.

BillingSubscriptionMergeRequest.description: Request to merge two billing subscriptions

targetBillingSubscriptionId.description: The ID of the target billing subscription with which the billing subscription in request will be merged.

quantity.description: The quantity of the product of target subscription to which the subscription in request needs to be merged into.

BillingSubscriptionSplitRequest.description: Request to split a billing subscription

billingFrequency.description: The billing frequency in ISO8601 format of the target product to which the subscription needs to be split into. Example: P1M, P3M, P1Y

quantity.description: The quantity of the target product to which the subscription needs to be split into.

targetProductTypeId.description: The ID of the target product to which the subscription needs to be split into. This value is not same as the value returned in Get API call and can be retrieved from Catalog API to know the product id to split into.

targetSkuId.description: The ID of the target product to which the subscription needs to be split into. This value is not same as the value returned in Get API call and can be retrieved from Catalog API to know the sku id to split into.

term.description: The term of the target in ISO8601 format product to which the subscription needs to be split into. Example: P1M, P1Y

EnrollmentAccountSubscriptionDetails.description: The billing properties that can be modified. Available only for the Enterprise Agreement Type.

subscriptionEnrollmentAccountStatus.description: The current enrollment account status of the subscription. This field is available only for the Enterprise Agreement Type.

enrollmentAccountStartDate.description: The enrollment Account and the subscription association start date. This field is available only for the Enterprise Agreement Type.

NextBillingCycleDetails.description: Billing cycle details of the product.

billingFrequency.description: Billing frequency of the product under the subscription.

resellerId.description: The MPN ID of the reseller.

SubscriptionTransferValidationErrorCode.description: Error code of the transfer validation response.

TransferBillingSubscriptionRequestProper.description: Request parameters to transfer billing subscription.

ValidateSubscriptionTransferEligibilityR.description: Result of the transfer eligibility validation.

isTransferEligible.description: Specifies whether the subscription is eligible to be transferred.

ValidateSubscriptionTransferEligibilityE.description: Error details of the transfer eligibility validation

code.description: Error code for the product transfer validation.

details.description: Detailed error message explaining the error.

BillingSubscriptionAliasListResult.description: The list of billing subscription aliases.

value.description: The list of billing subscription aliases.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

billingSubscriptionId.description: The ID of the billing subscription of the subscription alias.

isDataAction.description: Identifies if the operation is a data operation.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed such as invoice and billing subscription.

operation.description: Operation type such as read, write and delete.

OperationListResult.description: The list of billing operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

value.description: The list of billing operations supported by the Microsoft.Billing resource provider.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

ErrorResponse.description: Error response indicates that the service is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

target.description: The target of the particular error.

details.description: The sub details of the error.

ErrorSubDetails.description: The sub details of the error.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

target.description: The target of the particular error.

billingAccountNameParameter.name: billingAccountName
billingAccountNameParameter.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a billing account.

transferTrackingGuidParameter.name: transferTrackingGuid
transferTrackingGuidParameter.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a billing subscription transfer request.

billingProfileNameParameter.name: billingProfileName
billingProfileNameParameter.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a billing profile.

billingSubscriptionNameParameter.name: billingSubscriptionName
billingSubscriptionNameParameter.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a subscription.

costCenterNameParameter.name: costCenterName
costCenterNameParameter.description: Request parameters that are provided to the update cost center operation.

customerNameParameter.name: customerName
customerNameParameter.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a customer.

enrollmentAccountNameParameter.name: enrollmentAccountName
enrollmentAccountNameParameter.description: The ID that uniquely identifies an enrollment account.

departmentNameParameter.name: departmentName
departmentNameParameter.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a department.

invoiceSectionNameParameter.name: invoiceSectionName
invoiceSectionNameParameter.description: The ID that uniquely identifies an invoice section.

billingSubscriptionAliasNameParameter.name: billingSubscriptionAliasName
billingSubscriptionAliasNameParameter.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a subscription alias.

apiVersionParameter.name: api-version
apiVersionParameter.description: The version of the API to be used with the client request. The current version is 2020-11-01-privatepreview.
